events.message: The customer reported that their car was involved in a collision at an intersection causing significant front-end damage.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and accident details.
An agent was assigned to the claim to assist the customer throughout the damage assessment and claim process.
The customer was informed that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged and is being processed.
Request sent to the customer for photographs of the vehicle damage and police accident report for further evaluation.
Customer submitted all required documents including accident photos and official police report timely for claim processing.
Investigation officially commenced with an assigned inspector to verify the claim details and assess the damage.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the collision details and estimating repair costs for vehicle damage.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the prompt communication throughout the claim process.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department following customer agreement to the settlement offer.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as per the agreed settlement.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and customer satisfaction.
All case files and claim documents were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
